sources.sourceDescription: If there is more than a 10% rate of change in any cpu util series in a 10 minute window, return true.  Then take the sum of the number of series that qualify
sources.name: cpuUtil

sources.sourceDescription: If there is more than a 10% rate of change in any db connection series in a 10 minute window, return true.  Then take the sum of the number of series that qualify
sources.name: dbConnections

sources.sourceDescription: If there is more than a 10% rate of change in any write iops series in a 10 minute window, return true.  Then take the sum of the number of series that qualify
sources.name: writeIops

sources.sourceDescription: This Alert Condition will trigger when the CPU is above 80% and the change occurred within the past 15 minutes. Click "Create Alert" below to make this an alert in your environment.
sources.name: Alert Condition

sources.sourceDescription: Database connections increasing too rapidly. Click "Create Alert" below to make this an alert in your environment.

sources.sourceDescription: Alert if read latency remains over .5 seconds. Click "Create Alert" below to make this an alert in your environment.

sources.sourceDescription: Alert when disk usage is over 80%. Rate at which a disk is being written to should often be considered in conjunction with disk usage. Click "Create Alert" below to make this an alert in your environment.
sources.name: alert

sources.sourceDescription: Alerts when the amount of received traffic increases/decreases by more than 3x in a 15 minute window. Click "Create Alert" below to make this an alert in your environment.
